title: Register to book driving tests as a trainer or business

details.description: Register with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) to book theory and practical driving tests more easily
details.alternative_title: Register as a trainer booker to book driving tests
details.body:
Register with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) so you can book certain types of theory and practical driving tests more easily.

There are 2 ways you can register with DSA:

  • as a business
  • as a trainer booker

The option you choose will depend on the type of tests you want to book.

Register as a business

When you register as a business:

  • you can book any type of practical test
  • you can give your payment details once so you don’t have to give them each time you book
  • you must give your pupil’s details when you book the test
  • you can manage your availability for driving tests if you’re an approved driving instructor (ADI)

How to register as a business

To register, download the business registration form and send it to DSA.

Download ‘DSA business registration’ (PDF, 121KB)


Driving Standards Agency
PO Box 280
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE99 1FP

Register as a trainer booker

When you register as a trainer booker:

  • you can book and pay for test slots in advance without giving your pupil’s details until nearer the test date
  • you don’t have to give your payment details each time you book test slots

You can trainer book the tests shown in the table.

Theory tests Practical tests
Car Motorcycle
Motorcycle Lorry and bus
Lorry and bus Car towing a trailer
ADI part 1  

You’ll be able to trainer book all 4 parts of the Driver Certificate of Professional Competence initial qualification for lorry and bus drivers.

How to register as a trainer booker

To register you need to:

  1. Register with the Government Gateway as an organisation, if you aren’t already registered.

  2. Fill in the online registration form to register with DSA.

  3. Make a note of the business ID you’re given, as you’ll need this again.

  4. Check your email for the activation code so you can enrol to use the DSA practical test online business service.

  5. Access the DSA online business service to sign the trainer booker agreements for practical tests.

  6. Download the theory test application form and send it to DSA if you also want to trainer book theory tests.

Download ‘Application to trainer book theory tests’ (PDF, 113KB)


Theory Test Trainer Booking
Driving Standards Agency
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP

You must register with DSA and have a business ID before you send the theory test application form.
